title.narrative: Microfinance - INFUSE Program in East Timor

description.narrative: The Inclusive Finance for the Under-served Economy (INFUSE) Program to be jointly administered by the United Nations Development Program and the United Nations Capital Development Fund and aims to build an inclusive financial sector with the overall goal of increasing sustainable access to a range of financial services for the poor and low income population in East Timor. The funding will support INFUSE to achieve its three main outcomes: policy development and strategic coordination to enhance the enabling environment; facilitating the growth and long-term sustainability of microfinance institution, so that they can increase their outreach to poor and low income people; and establishment of financial business support infrastructure in East Timor. The total value of this initiative is $2.5 million over 4 years, starting 2009-10.
